articles.description: Days after the IPL 2023 final, Chennai Super Kings bowling coach and his good friend Kieron Pollard, who worked with Mumbai Indians as their batting coach, were involved in banter over the most successful side in the tournament history.
articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: West Indies stars Dwayne Bravo and Kieron Pollard were involved in banter as they took a car ride together, days after the IPL 2023 final. Bravo, who was the bowling coach… [+2447 chars]

articles.title: "Slow down with the Rafa thing, it's getting annoying" - Tennis fans disappointed with Iga Swiatek's pre-match routine being compared to Nadal's - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Iga Swiatek's preparation routine for her French Open 2023 match against Claire Liu caught tennis fans' attention as they think the comparison with Rafael Nadal is not justified.
articles.content:
